main event: A civilian in Dayton, Ohio reported seeing an unidentified object on October 19, 1964 at around 10:50 PM.
interesting points: The object was observed for around 10 minutes.
The object was described as a single white light, brighter than the brightest stars.
The object moved in a straight line and the edges were described as fuzzy or blurred.
The observer was unable to estimate the speed or distance of the object.
No physical evidence or photographs were obtained.
sighted object: a single white light, brighter than the brightest stars
